page.title: 20A STOTTESDON PENSIONER'S DAY
page.content: {I am a widow with one son}living at home. My day begins at 7am. with our breakfast, then all the usual household jobs. Coffee time comes and a look at the morning paper. Then I finish the housework and have lunch followed by a rest before going into the garden, weather permitting, to do the jobs that keep the garden tidy. On wet days the afternoon is spent knitting, sewing or reading. The evening meal is then prepared, cooked and eaten. The rest of the evening is spent watching television, sewing or knitting until about 10.30pm., then bed and a book to read. __________________ Children from the School helped Stottesdon W.I.to gather information to add to members' local knowledge, & loaned their computer.
